meaning: 평범한 일, 흔한 일, 평범한, 흔한
exampleEn: Working overtime has become commonplace in this industry.
exampleKo: 이 업계에서는 야근이 흔한 일이 되었습니다.

exampleEn: All lab technicians must wear a protective smock.
exampleKo: 모든 실험실 기술자는 보호 작업복을 착용해야 합니다.

exampleEn: Her testimony was crucial to the case.
The project was completed in accordance with the schedule.
It is crucial to follow the safety guidelines.
exampleKo: 안전 지침을 따르는 것은 매우 중요합니다.

exampleEn: Any deviation from the plan must be reported immediately.
exampleKo: 계획에서의 어떠한 일탈도 즉시 보고되어야 합니다.

exampleEn: She effortlessly completed the difficult task.
exampleKo: 그녀는 어려운 업무를 힘들이지 않고 완료했습니다.

exampleEn: The office will be closed in observance of the holiday.
I inadvertently sent the email to the wrong person.
exampleKo: 저는 실수로(무심코) 엉뚱한 사람에게 이메일을 보냈습니다.

exampleEn: The company is involved in a judicial dispute.
exampleKo: 그 회사는 사법 분쟁에 휘말려 있습니다.

exampleEn: There is no justification for such behavior.
The manager is keenly aware of the problems.
The employees filed a lawsuit against the company.
He wants to escape from his mundane daily routine.
exampleKo: 그는 일상적인 지루한 일과에서 벗어나고 싶어 합니다.

exampleEn: This area is off-limits to unauthorized personnel.
exampleKo: 이 구역은 인가받지 않은 인원에게는 출입 금지입니다.

exampleEn: The city council passed a new ordinance.
The controversial ad was pulled from the campaign.
He was reprimanded for his poor performance.
The committee adopted a resolution to cut costs.
exampleKo: 위원회는 비용을 절감하기 위한 결의안을 채택했습니다.

exampleEn: Competition in the market is stiff.
You need evidence to substantiate your claim.
Do not trespass on private property.
Companies must not violate environmental laws.
Bonuses are awarded at the discretion of the manager.
We are legally bound to fulfill the contract.
exampleKo: 우리는 법적으로 계약을 이행할 의무가 있습니다.

exampleEn: The regulations circumscribe the powers of the director.
The enactment of the new law was celebrated.
His service record is impeccable.
Copyright infringement is a serious offense.
He has a legitimate reason for being absent.
exampleKo: 그는 결석에 대한 정당한 이유가 있습니다.

exampleEn: Residents signed a petition against the construction.
She is an expert when it comes to marketing.
